name: intersocietal
content:
Add to word list

between different human societies: Intersocietal marriages continue to occur in the region. The project was an investigation into intersocietal contact in prehistoric times. Related word
societal
More examplesFewer examplesNot all intersocietal networks involve exploitation.The widespread distribution of artefacts provides evidence of intersocietal contact.International conflict must be viewed as not merely an intergovernmental phenomenon, but also as an intersocietal phenomenon.Gift-giving was an integral part of social interaction and ensured social cohesion and intersocietal stability.
